concept.title: Mechanical browser panel
concept.shortdesc: The Mechanical browser panel offers a central location to view and modify parametric properties of mechanical parts and assemblies.

section.title: Parameter list
section.p: Displays a list of all the parameters and constraints in the drawing. They are organized in expandable categories which may include user parameters, 2D dimensional constraints, 3D dimensional constraints, 3D geometric constraints, block parameters and array parameters. Right-click menus offer additional tools for some parameters and constraints.

section.title: Properties
section.p: Specifies the properties of the selected item.

section.title: Group by entity
section.p: Groups 3D constraints by entity. Expand an entity to view its associated constraints.

section.title: Group by type
section.p: Groups 3D constraints by type. Expand a constraint to view the affected entities.

section.title: Sort Alphabetically
section.p: Lists mechanical components and 3D constraints alphabetically. Otherwise, they are listed in the order they are added to the assembly.

section.title: Show search
section.p: Toggles the search field and associated tools on and off. You can also press CTRL+F to toggle Search.

dlentry.dd: Searches the parameter list for the character string you enter. The arrow tools to the right of the search field enable you find the next or previous occurrence of the text string.
